name: A Laravel Form Base Model
body:
### Why model forms?

Form validation is generally not the same as validating your data models. Form models are also a convenient location to store form-specific presentation such as static arrays for populating select drop-downs. 

[A video explaining a bit more about form models can be found here.](http://heybigname.com/2012/05/22/introduction-to-the-form-model/)

### Features

- Handles form validation
- Easy form field re-population
- Provides a location for defining custom validation rules
- Easily manage form field data across multiple page forms

### Bundle Installation

Install with artisan

	php artisan bundle:install form-base-model

or, clone the project into **bundles/form-base-model**.

Then, update your bundles.php to auto-start the bundle.

	return array(
		'form-base-model' => array( 'auto' => true ),
	);

**Notice:** The form-base-model bundle comes with examples that will auto-route to http://yoursite/form_examples. Remember to remove this from bundles/form-base-model/start.php when you're finished with the examples.

### Documentation

Additional documentation can be found in the README.md file here: https://github.com/ShawnMcCool/laravel-form-base-model/blob/master/README.md
